Facts.fact: Only about 1,000 giant pandas live in the wild today.
The lips of bears are not attached to their gums, which make their lips look rubbery.
Baloo, from The Jungle Book, is a sloth bear.
Most bears have 42 teeth, which is about 10 more than people have. A bear’s canines can reach 4cm long, while a human’s are less than 1.2cm long.
The giant panda has been described as a living fossil because it is such an ancient animal.
Polar bears can swim up to 96km without stopping.
